349050.name: Pneuma: Breath of Life - Soundtrack
349050.description:
Pneuma: Breath of Life - Soundtrack is the official soundtrack which includes a collection of 14 beautiful tracks from the game, composed & scored by Yakobo.

TRACK LIST:
  • In The Beginning
  • A Crafted World
  • The Center Of The Universe
  • Ontological Mysteries
  • The Universe's Machine Epsilon
  • Forks In The Path
  • Perspective
  • Enigma
  • Anthropomorphized
  • A Wooden Boy
  • And The Universe Aligns
  • A Leap Of Faith
  • There's A Puzzle For You
  • In The Beginning, Me
349050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
